document_data.name: Amalae's
document_data.mainbody: '''Amalae's''' was a beauty shop in the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This building stood at the northwestern end of the culdesac [[The Boomgarden]].
document_data.Services:
The proprietors of this shop offered baths, hair-washing, hair-stylings, "touches" (manicures and pedicures), and other cosmetic applications within separate rooms of the building.

Additionally, those who worked here would offer patrons a fee to share a bed with them for the night or to rent out their attic. Some [[wizard]]s were known to rent out this attic so they could conduct private [[spell]]-study.
document_data.Inhabitants: This shop was lived in and run by [[Amalae]] and her six housemates.
